summary: Feature request to add WorkflowExecutionAlreadyTerminated error for handling attempts to terminate an already-terminated workflow with the same ID, similar to the existing WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedError.
userImpact: Users need a specific exception to distinguish workflow already terminated scenarios from other errors when calling terminate on completed workflows.
rootCause: Lack of specific exception type to differentiate WorkflowExecutionAlreadyTerminated from generic not found errors.
proposedFix: Implement WorkflowExecutionAlreadyTerminated exception similar to WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedError pattern in the codebase.
resolutionDetails: Comment indicates existing not-found exception already handles this case, making a new exception unnecessary.
keyQuote: It'd just be not found and we already have that exception
